data.message: Harden resolution stats for zero-lies CI output: Added: (1) health_metric field to anchor what health measures, (2) contextual notes for unknown/blind states, (3) explicit dict() conversion for JSON safety. Truth table now clean: excellent/good/degraded/blind = measured reality, unknown + null = not measured.
data.task: Harden resolution stats for zero-lies CI output
data.outcome: Added: (1) health_metric field to anchor what health measures, (2) contextual notes for unknown/blind states, (3) explicit dict() conversion for JSON safety. Truth table now clean: excellent/good/degraded/blind = measured reality, unknown + null = not measured.
